Key Match Events: Isak received a yellow card in the 38th minute
Cajuste received a yellow card in the 90+2 minute
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark is preparing for Euro 2024, while Sweden did not qualify
Denmark has not conceded a goal in a home friendly for almost seven years
Sweden's new coach Jon Dahl Tomasson is the first non-Swede to manage the team
Sweden's Alexander Isak is expected to lead the attack
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Parken Stadium in Copenhagen
Denmark's last exhibition defeat at home was in 2015 to France
